thread.title: Senior Treasury Analyst at Kelly Services (Troy, MI)
thread.title_full: Senior Treasury Analyst at Kelly Services (Troy, MI)

title: Senior Treasury Analyst at Kelly Services (Troy, MI)
text: Source: TreasuryJobs.com Kelly Services, a leading provider in workforce solutions, has an excellent full time opportunity for a Senior Treasury Analyst to work at their corporate headquarters, Troy, MI. The primary job function of this position is to support the Treasury function by performing strategic, tactical, and operational responsibilities including the following: - Domestic cash management including weekly cash forecasting - Month end reporting and journal entries - Bank account maintenance - Borrowing and paydown activities - Interact with internal departments and banks to resolve issues/discrepancies - Ad hoc financial analysis - Data analysis with TM1 and other Kelly systems - Project work
